body: Attacking him just brings more problems what he did was better

Gtfoh and kys, his priority is protecting his wife and child not act badass against this asshole whose been bullying and harassing him in his life. That move he did was not the best thing but still better than not doing shit. Overall, the netorare based yet good ending story is decent but could have been done better yet in the end he got his wife back by scaring this pussy ass douche and that’s all that matters. Not the best doujin this artist has put out but it’s still better than most garbage NTR these days

Try to kill him and he will fight back, he'll get attempted murder if the guy survives and assault, imprisoning him and leaving the girl.
